preqs: ATS1338 and ATS1339, and 12 credit points in Linguistics at level 2 units

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1338, ATS1339} and  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2665, ATS2667, ATS2668, ATS2669, ATS2671, ATS2672, ATS2673, ATS2674, ATS2676, ATS2678, ATS2679, ATS2680, ATS2681, ATS2682, ATS2683})

description: Introduction to the principles of articulatory phonetics and the International Phonetic Alphabet. Introduction to the acoustic analysis of speech sounds and their measurement. Introduction to the principles of phonological analysis and issues in phonological theory.
